name: Greed Island: Under the light
description:
Story

Shelly's friend, a lighthouse keeper named Bellamy, has suddenly stopped responding to their letters. Taking matters into their own hands, Shelly reaches the island with the help of its custodian, Hoartion, only to find out Greed Island might just have something deeper going on. Is it just a trick of the mind, or will this visit turn into a rescue mission?

Explore

Explore the island, discover its secrets and find your friends.

Craft

Collect materials and craft items to help you progress.

This game is still in very early development and will be updated.
